name: Groove
description:
Groove is a FFA game where maps that change to one of the 15 maps when there's only one player alive.

Each map randomly spawns 19 unique weapons and pick-ups in the sky that you can interact with. Some maps have preplaced items in them.

WASD to move

E to pick up items

Q to throw items

Weapons and orbs

- 13 weapons to interact ranging from a pistol to a minigun.

- White Orb: Makes you invisible.

- Orange Orb: 2x Damage

- Blue Orb: 50% movement speed increase

- Yellow Orb: 50% Firerate increase

- Red Orb: Increases health by 50%

Note: 2-4 player lobbies that need their own host transport to start a game.
